subject: Football
Dogfighting
Memorabilia
lead_paragraph: Upper Deck has removed all Michael Vick autographed memorabilia from its online store and will remove his trading card from N.F.L. sets that are scheduled to be released in October.Vick has pleaded not guilty to federal dogfighting charges in Richmond, Va.
